short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Used with your Procoser PBX to receive call-, voicemail- and chat messages, and Click2Dial from any webpage.
short.de: Zur Verwendung mit Ihrer Procoser-Telefonanlage zum Empfang von Benachrichtigungen bei eingehenden Anrufen, Sprach- und…
short.es: Se utiliza con su PBX de Procoser en la Nube para recibir llamadas, correo de voz y chat, y hacer clic para marcar (Click2Dial)…
short.fr: Utilisé avec votre Procoser PBX pour recevoir les appels, les chats, les messages vocaux et  Click2Dial dans les pages web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What's New
3.4
-Added support for New one Click to Dial (without having to high-lite the number first)
-Added Hook and sidebar with access to Portal as part of the embedded Context script
3.5
Added support for Menu in Sidebar to access your Video Meetings 
3.6
- Fixed Missed call and Voicemail badge location in the Popup.
3.7
-Fix issue where Win 10 would only display an Incoming call Notification once.
-Changed Notification Icons to White on dark gray.
3.8 - 4.2
- Fixed Issue with Exporting of setting not working since 3.1
4.3
- Removed the requirment for Cookies in the manifest file.
4.4
Position of hook stored.
hook and portal frame cannot move off visible page (also for browser resize).
Login/logout and enabled/disable of extension dealt with better (i.e. the hook/frame + click2dial are all enabled/disabled).
Improved hook sliding up/down.
hook and portal frame are now display: fixed, which will keep them in place in the page scrolls.
4.5
Can close portal frame if portal frame has js error on it.
4.6
webRTCIPHandlingPolicy flag set to 'default_public_interface_only' to improve ice candidate gathering
4.7
bug fix for 'Display a notification for incoming chat messages' checkbox in options not appearing
new check box in options to enable side bar [default is off]
4.8 
Answer and chat focus (notifications) for webphone
5.0
 Bug fixes for, showing chat, showing correct portal frame and opening new tab on specified frames. 
Fix for diversion speed dials (now have # added in storage) new speed dial layout in local storage. 
Fix for dial from clipboard
